fields.name: Fun quote of the Year
fields.value: "The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all of its contents" - H.P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulu

fields.name: Politics

Climate, trains (and bikes), justice, progressivism, internationalism, democratic pluralism. 
Practical socialism.
